## ğŸ’¡ The Mission

Every month, developers pay hundreds of dollars for tools that should be free. **v0.dev** charges $20/month for 500 generations. **Datadog** costs $69-99 per host. **Postman** is $49/user. **CodeRabbit** is $50/user.

We're changing that.

Aethyrion is building a complete ecosystem of **100% free, open-source alternatives** to expensive paid developer tools. No VC funding. No corporate overlords. Just a developer who believes great tools shouldn't cost $100/month.

## ğŸŒ€ Helix - AI Component Generator
**Status:** âœ… Live Now | **Repo:** [AethyrionAI/Helix](https://github.com/AethyrionAI/Helix)

Free alternative to **v0.dev** ($20/mo) and **Magic Patterns** ($49/mo).

Generate React components from text prompts or screenshots. Upload up to **10 images** with Glimpse vision. Use **10+ AI providers** with **21,000+ free requests/day**. Get instant previews and one-click AI error fixing.

**Key Features:**
- ğŸ¨ Text & screenshot-to-component generation
- ğŸ“¸ 10-image multi-modal support with Glimpse
- âš¡ Instant preview with hot reload
- ğŸ”§ AI-powered error fixing
- ğŸŒ 10+ AI providers (Groq, Gemini, Cerebras, Claude, OpenAI, DeepSeek)
- ğŸ’» Local AI support (Ollama, LM Studio) - 100% offline
- ğŸ” AES-GCM encrypted API key storage
- ğŸ“¦ One-click export to clipboard

**Tech Stack:** React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Electron, Next.js

## ğŸ”· Prism - ServiceNow AI Assistant
**Status:** ğŸ§ª Beta | **Repo:** [AethyrionAI/Prism](https://github.com/AethyrionAI/Prism)

**Key Features:**
- ğŸ¤– AI-powered ServiceNow content generation
- ğŸ¨ 5 ServiceNow-inspired themes
- ğŸ“š 23 templates with 9.1/10 quality rating
- ğŸ” RAG-enhanced code generation
- âœ… Built-in validation system
- ğŸ¯ GlideRecord query builder

## ğŸš€ Getting Started

### Try Helix (Live Now!)
```bash
# Clone the repo
git clone https://github.com/AethyrionAI/Helix.git
cd Helix

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Run the app
npm start
```

Or download the desktop app from [Releases](https://github.com/AethyrionAI/Helix/releases) â¬‡ï¸

### Stay Updated
â­ **Star this organization** to get notified when new tools launch!

## ğŸ’ª Why Aethyrion?

| Feature | Paid Tools | Aethyrion |
|---------|-----------|-----------|
| **Cost** | $20-100/month/user | **$0 forever** |
| **Usage Limits** | Strict tiers & caps | **Unlimited** |
| **Source Code** | Proprietary | **MIT License** |
| **Data Privacy** | Sent to cloud | **Your machine** |
| **Vendor Lock-in** | High | **None** |
| **Local AI Support** | Rare | **Built-in** |
